attributes.action: order Nigel Evans MP to refund the cost of all the foreign travel he has undertaken at taxpayers expense, which was not taken as a direct result of his appointment as an elected member of parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Travel at taxpayer expense without purpose is misappropriation of public funds and a benefit in kind.  Mr Evans needs to pay back the total cost of the 50 trips he has taken in the past 10 years, with interest, PLUS any tax that would have been due on the benefit in kind.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
